outputs.output_descr:
Output:
•Strengthen the capacity of the OECS Secretariat to lead regional policy development and reform, and to provide technical advisory services and guidance to governments in key areas of social protection, social services delivery and inclusive growth policy formulation including agricultural sector and the sustainable rural development policy.

project_descr: Strengthening capacities and efforts to reduce poverty and achieve sustainable human develpment within the Organization of Eastern Caribbean States through capacity building at the national level on the MDGs.
project_title: Poverty & Social Sector Development in the OECS
